ResourceHeader.Description: The SDO (Solar Dynamics Observatory) AIA (Atmospheric Imaging Assembly) is a battery of four telescopes designed to image the dynamic solar atmosphere in multiple different wavelengths to link changes in the surface to those in the interior. Data will include images of the Sun that span at least 1.3 solar diameters in 10 wavelengths (7 EUV and 3 UV-visible channels) nearly simultaneously, at a resolution of about 1 arcsec and at a cadence of 10 seconds or better
